description.narrative: The Youth Leaders will be attached to the VU-YPC-project Youth Voice Matter. This project wishes to target the YPC core values and mission in promoting youth engagement in society. The project will specifically center around the local and regional election commencing by latest September 2021, and go on to December 2021 to consolidate existing organizational structures and legitimacy in YPC, increase knowledge on advocacy and increase YPC member count. The project will focus firstly on creating a general campaign for the local and regional election, to increase political empowerment for women and youth. The campaign will be used as a stepping stone in consolidating YPC, and to increase YPC members' knowledge and skill. A national survey will furthermore be conducted on the topic of youth relationship with politics and elections. The regional outreach will encourage youth to partake in the national seminars that will further consolidate the YPC national committee structure. The national seminars will be a joint effort, commenced both by the VU-members and YPC-members.
